intro: Psychotria umbriana, commonly known as the darkleaf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in areas with humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers. It is often found in understory habitats of tropical rainforests, where it thrives in low light conditions. The plant contains various alkaloids, some of which have been studied for their potential pharmacological properties.
